Hugh Michael Jackman is an Australian actor, singer and producer. Jackman has won international recognition for playing different roles in various film genres. \n\nHe is best known for his long-running role as Wolverine in the X-Men film series, as well as for his lead roles in the romantic-comedy fantasy Kate & Leopold (2001), the action-horror film Van Helsing (2004)...
